attributes.action: 1000 richest people pay off the debt
attributes.additional_details: According to the annual Sunday Times Rich List, the richest 1,000 persons in the UK now sit atop of £414bn, a sum more than three times the size of the entire budget deficit. This petition advocates  a one off off tax to take a third of their wealth to pay off the deficit. Any one of the 1000 richest disagreeing will have all their wealth confiscated. Any of the 1000 attempting to relocate their wealth will have all their wealth confiscated
